name: Dume
description:
Thank you for playing!

Move with WASD + Mouse. Shoot with the left mouse button.

The theme is "Lost in Space", so decided to make a game about managing the space between you and the enemy. You heal by being close to the enemy, but you can only shoot when you're putting yourself in the open.

The music was made by my brother for this game jam.

The environment assets are from Quixel Megascans, the worm model is from Turbosquid. Sounds from freesound, then edited with Reaper. Modeling and scene layout in Blender.

Made with my toy game engine. If you run into a bug or crash, please let me know and I'll fix it ASAP
